the parents seems happy to meet their son .

output.sentences: Today I brought my boyfriend, Jeff, home to meet my parents.
They seem to like him so far but maybe they are just smiling for the camera.
Hopefully the wine will help to ease the tension in the room.
We are enjoying a healthy and delicious dinner together.
Due to the good food and wine, It's nearing the end of the dinner and everyone is still getting along.
